ingredients: 1  apple, roughly chopped, 1  banana, broken into chunks, 2  kiwifruit, peeled, 1   +   1/4 cups milk,   +   1/4 cup ice, or as desired, 2 teaspoons chia seeds, 1 teaspoon maca powder
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 6%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 12mg 4%, Sodium 67mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 44g 16%, Dietary Fiber 7g 25%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 78mg 388%, Calcium 227mg 17%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 749mg 16%
